form.name: form1

div.span: This site has been in BETA for 2055 days

span.div: According to the Governor of Ohio, CCPA, along with all Ohio schools, will be closed from Monday, March 16, through Friday May 1. Please use the website to stay informed with the latest information and resources for at-home learning. Thank you for your continued support!

div.div: Address: 1425 Linn Street - Cincinnati, Ohio 45214 | Phone: 513.684.0777 | Fax: 513-684-8888

div.style: background: rgb(39,36,115); /* Old browsers */ /* IE9 SVG, needs conditional override of 'filter' to 'none' */ background: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,); background: -moz-linear-gradient(left, rgba(39,36,115,1) 0%, rgba(39,36,115,1) 66%, rgba(19,18,56,1) 100%); /* FF3.6+ */ background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, right top, color-stop(0%,rgba(39,36,115,1)), color-stop(66%,rgba(39,36,115,1)), color-stop(100%,rgba(19,18,56,1))); /* Chrome,Safari4+ */ background: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, rgba(39,36,115,1) 0%,rgba(39,36,115,1) 66%,rgba(19,18,56,1) 100%); /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */ background: -o-linear-gradient(left, rgba(39,36,115,1) 0%,rgba(39,36,115,1) 66%,rgba(19,18,56,1) 100%); /* Opera 11.10+ */ background: -ms-linear-gradient(left, rgba(39,36,115,1) 0%,rgba(39,36,115,1) 66%,rgba(19,18,56,1) 100%); /* IE10+ */ background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(39,36,115,1) 0%,rgba(39,36,115,1) 66%,rgba(19,18,56,1) 100%); /* W3C */ filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#272473', endColorstr='#131238',GradientType=1 ); /* IE6-8 */ margin-top:65px;
